Dear {!Lead.Name},
Thank you for applying for the Energy Consultant opportunity with Borrego Solar Systems. Please fill out the attached questionnaire, and email it back to lpompei@borregosolar.com at your earliest convenience. We will review your qualifications and if we see a match, you will be contacted for further information.
Again, thank you for your interest in Borrego Solar.
Sincerely,
Lindsay Pompei
